name: Munchlax Analysis, based on a CoolGames Inc Idea
name_original: Munchlax Analysis, based on a CoolGames Inc Idea
description:
The year is 1999. You are a film critic all to aware of their own mortality. On top of that you've come up against your biggest challenge to date: reviewing "Pokemon: The First Movie".

Are you able to wade through your own confusion to produce a stellar review? Is film analysis really what you want to be doing with your life? What the fuck is a Mewtwo?

Features include multiple story paths, endings and an overarching sense of ennui.

Based on Polygon's "CoolGames Inc" podcast, episode 46 "Munchlax Analysis". Thanks to hosts Griffin McElroy and Nick Robinson for the idea and for making my week every week.
